Bash("C:\Users\f.biggi\AppData\Local\miniconda3\python.exe" -c "
from robimb.extraction.orchestrator import Orchestrator, OrchestratorConfig
from robimb.extraction.fuse import Fuser, FusePolicy
from robimb.extraction.qa_llm import MockLLM
from robimb.extraction.schema_registry import load_category_schema

cfg = OrchestratorConfig(source_priority=[''parser'', ''matcher'', ''qa_llm''], enable_matcher=True, enable_llm=False, registry_path=''data/properties/registry.json'')
fuse = Fuser(policy=FusePolicy.VALIDATE_THEN_MAX_CONF, source_priority=cfg.source_priority)
orch = Orchestrator(fuse=fuse, llm=MockLLM(), cfg=cfg)

doc = {''text'': ''PX15 - Fornitura e posa in opera di griglia in acciaio per scarico a pavimento tipo AISI 304, dim. 20x20 cm'', ''categoria'': ''apparecchi_sanitari_accessori''}
result = orch.extract_document(doc)
print(''Materiale:'', result[''properties''][''materiale''])
")
